subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rangers Coach John Tortorella went to work on the team’s new attack-minded philosophy, but it was not enough to prevent the Rangers from losing for the 11th time in 13 games.
snippet: Rangers Coach John Tortorella went to work on the team’s new attack-minded philosophy, but it was not enough to prevent the Rangers from losing for the 11th time in 13 games.
